overview.name: Team Disney – Michael D. Eisner Building
overview.description: This is the corporate headquarters for Disney’s upper-management, located in Burbank, California. It houses the Executive Chairman, CEO, and the Board of Directors. Here is where all the high-level decision making and meetings take place. It was completed in 1990 and was built around sculptures of the seven dwarves, in memory of the movie that gained Walt Disney the money to buy his Burbank lot, Snow White and the Seven Dwarves.

location.address: 500 S Buena Vista St, Burbank, CA 91521

overview.name: Frank G Wells Building
overview.description: This building lies near the entrance of the Burbank Lot. It holds a number of administrative functions, being home to the mail center, Disney’s archives, Disney Music Group, and Marvel Studios. It used to be home to Disney’s Television division, which has since been relocated. It was designed for that purpose, yet remains useful as a center for various auxiliary administrative functions. It houses a number of multipurpose rooms for this reason, as well as a screening room.

location.address: 500 S Buena Vista St, Burbank, CA 91521

overview.name: Animation Building
overview.description: Completed in 1940, this is one of the original structures that is still a working piece of the Burbank campus. It was once the “creative and administrative nucleus” of Disney, housing animation and financial sectors alike. Many of the most classic original Disney films from 1941 to 1970 were drawn here, and Walt Disney himself used to have his office on the Third Floor. It now serves as an administrative building mostly for producers who have distribution deals with Disney.

location.address: 500 S Buena Vista St, Burbank, CA 91521

overview.name: The Roy E. Disney Animation Building
overview.description: This building was completed in 1994 as the new center for the Walt Disney Animation Studios. It became the home for the animation department after their relocation to Glendale in 1985. Walt Disney Feature Animation was split off as a subsidiary of the larger company, and this is where it is housed. It has a big spire painted as the Sorcerer’s Hat from Fantasia and remains a creative center for the animation work of Disney.

location.address: 500 S Buena Vista St, Burbank, CA 91521
500 S Buena Vista St, Burbank, CA 91521

overview.name: Campus Map
overview.description: In the space formerly occupied by the Glendale Airport, Disney purchased and redeveloped land to house a large-scale collection of creative buildings spanning 6 million square feet. This complex houses the Disney Television Animation division, DisneyToon studios, Marvel’s animation division, the headquarters for the Disney Store, and even an employee daycare center. This campus exists to centralize some of the creative spaces that aren’t directly on the main Burbank campus.

location.address: 500 S Buena Vista St, Burbank, CA 91521

overview.name: Walt Disney Imagineering
overview.description: A building found within the Grand Central Creative Campus, this is the Research and Development Wing of Disney Theme Parks. It also houses the personnel for Disney’s property management, including much of their theater holdings nationwide. It falls within the division of the company that handles the substantial theme park elements of the business, yet it is situated amongst other creative production spaces on the Creative Campus.

location.address: 500 S Buena Vista St, Burbank, CA 91521

overview.name: Team Disney Building
overview.description: This is the headquarters for Disney’s parks divisions, a huge part of their overall business. It is located in Lake Buena Vista, Florida, centralizing itself more around Walt Disney World in Orlando than the creative media production elements out in Los Angeles. It deals with the corporate elements of Disneyland and Disneyworld theme parks, as well as their worldwide resort offerings. There are regional divisions in California and Paris, as well as the locations in East Asia.

location.address: 500 S Buena Vista St, Burbank, CA 91521
